website_summaries.verdict: A nice solid-steel dustpan that is a lower price than some similar models.
pros: Includes a hole in the handle for hanging
Heavy enough to be set on the floor while you sweep debris into it
Works a lot better than plastic dustpans
cons: The handle on this model is a little shorter than others available

customer_reviews.title: 50 Stars! Best Dustpan Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, heavy duty, 11.5” wide x 7.75” deep. We’ve had this dustpan for over 3.5 years now and love how well it has stood up to my abuse. It is just heavy enough to place on a flat surface and sweep into it, and it is so precisely made that it only leaves a minutiae of residue. I have used this for scalping weeds off dirt, as it has a nice, sharpish edge to it - it will cut. Really no real issues. I look forward to using this for the rest of my life - fur shure. 😀. I recommend a “buy”!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzmanndan

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made. Sturdy.  All metal.
customer_reviews.text: Strangely enough, it isn't easy to find a metal dustpan that is all metal and is thick enough to be useful. This one is both. We heat our house with a wood furnace, and need to shovel ash out of the furnace daily. Those cute little fireplace shovels just don't cut it. This is all metal, so it is useful to shovel out live embers, and it is sturdy enough to lift out a lot of ash at one time. I can clean out the furnace with three scoops with this, versus 20+ with the little fireplace tool. For our purposes, it is perfect. It is sturdy and should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Wreader

customer_reviews.title: Well made should last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it came the next day, got tired of hearing about how the next time she went to the store needed to buy a "decent" dustpan. American made if I remember right, made heavy duty, strong pickup edge and the body of it has no flex to it very stiff. Not supposed to be pretty supposed to work hard for a long time which it will do based on how well it is made.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Scratched paint and the barcode label from Hell
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to have a sturdy metal dustpan. All the plastic ones sold at Walmart are junk. However, I was disappointed when my new metal dustpan arrived with severe scratches in the black paint. So I returned it and ordered another one. Imagine my surprise when the second one also had scratches on the same part of the handle. Ridiculous. Also, be prepared to spend about 30 minutes trying to remove the white bar-code label. They should consider using a label that comes off more easily.
customer_reviews.author: polishedstaple

customer_reviews.title: Dustpan to last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: This dustpan is black in color, and made of metal. It is not flimsy at all, and the edge contacts the floor tightly. Simple and well made. I would recommend this dustpan. The only improvement I can offer for this dustpan would be to use a barcade sticker that is easier to remove. *Side note: I am not being compensated in any way for my review.
customer_reviews.author: ryan hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Mr. McSadjanitor to the cafeteria please...
customer_reviews.text: Simply a badass, oldschool dustpan. I can almost smell that sawdust stuff the janitor would pour on puke when someone got sick in school... ANYWAY, very flat, better than some of the ones with the rubber front that's supposed to help get that last bit in but doesn't really.
customer_reviews.author: Druubis von Aqualung

customer_reviews.title: USA made dustpan.
customer_reviews.text: It's funny that it can be hard to find everyday items made in USA, but this is a nice dustpan, american made.
customer_reviews.author: Smaro

customer_reviews.title: BEST dustpan! Unbelievable price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dustpan because the plastic ones are full of static in the winter. I own a barbershop, and sweep hair up all day and was not happy with so much of the hair and dust clinging to the pan. This metal pan is nice and heavy. I can set it on the floor and sweep into it without bending down and, due to the heaviness of it, it stays put. Try that with plastic! I have trouble believing the reviewer that said their's was received damaged or bent. Mine was packaged in a box, not an envelope, and was shipped via UPS. Made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would like to have the handle be a little longer
customer_reviews.text: It appears that it will be quite durable and serviceable. It arrived with a medium-sized nick on the handle and some chipped paint - not problematic enough to warrant a return. I would like to have the handle be a little longer. The end does not extend beyond the palm of my hand, which makes it a little uncomfortable to use. And on a minor note - I hate it when bar codes are applied with labels that require an incredible amount of work to tear off. Clean peal glue please!
customer_reviews.author: Kir Mar

customer_reviews.title: No Country of Origin label
customer_reviews.text: The product picture clearly states "MADE IN U.S.A. The product that came was not labeled with a country of origin. I paid for a Made in the USA item. Did I get it? Who knows?
customer_reviews.author: SanJoseDad

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and will last
customer_reviews.text: 4.5 stars. This dustpan is built to last, and may last a left time. The dustpan is made of a sturdy metal and feels solid in your hand. I have used this for several months, inside and outside, and am pleased with the purchase. But there are some considerations before buying. It is a heavier dust pan at about 1-1.25 lb in weight.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great Dustpan
customer_reviews.text: Well made, comfortable to use. Mine was damaged in shipping (the seller sent it in a paper book mailer), so I negotiated a price reduction, and then pounded out the dents with a ball peen hammer, and straightened the dust collection edge with a metal seam crimper. I am using it in my workshop, so I thought I ought to be able to straighten out a few dents pretty easily. Now it is good as new except for a few chips in the paint. As others have pointed out, it is made in the USA. It is nice to see people here still making quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory R. Hill

customer_reviews.title: made to last. Thankfully it doesn't have quit the ...
customer_reviews.text: made to last. Thankfully it doesn't have quit the hump to get the dirt over and into the pan. I use this for my workrom and I will probably get another for my garage.
customer_reviews.author: one of Gods headaches

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think they made 'em like this anymore
customer_reviews.text: By Golly, I didn't think they made 'em like this anymore. You can step on it without splintering it into deadly plastic shards!
customer_reviews.author: zinger919

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this dust pan. can't find these steel ones in the stores anymore, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mastroianna

customer_reviews.title: Best Dustpan!
customer_reviews.text: It is no exaggeration to state that this is the Platonic ideal of dustpans - solid metal construction, built-in hole for hanging solid leading edge for brushing dust and other waste into its broad, flat pan. No one locally sells solid metal dustpans any more, so I was very happy I can order them. If you only buy one dustpan this year, buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Huddleston

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the picture this review is for a metal dustpan
customer_reviews.text: I think I've finally found a dustpan that will last more than a year; probably it could last a lifetime. We may be dustpan challenged in our house but usually dustpans either crack (the plastic ones) or get bent out of shape (the aluminum ones) after they've been stepped on one time too many. This dustpan is made of heavy gauge steel that is coated with heavy duty, baked-on paint; really made to last. The lip is a bit thick which makes sweeping up the fine dust a bit of a chore but I am more than willing to make that trade-off.
customer_reviews.author: wibekah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Construction
customer_reviews.text: Indestructible and essential need for the wood stove. All one piece construction, great for ash removal. 3 scoops an the firebox is clean.
customer_reviews.author: P. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: This Dustpan Will Outlast YOU
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, simple, functional, well-made and inexpensive--last dust pan you'll ever buy. Beats plastic versions hands-down.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not a great dustpan
customer_reviews.text: There is a gap between the floor and the dustpan so when you sweep into the dustpan everything just goes underneath it. Not sure why the other reviewers are so in love with this dustpan. I'm going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy steel with thick powder-coated paint.
customer_reviews.text: I have hardwood floors and was a bit nervous about scratches. But this dustpan is made so well that the edge is perfectly straight with no sharp edges or corners to catch on anything. No scratches on the floor whatsoever. Just don't drop it. Made in the USA, of course.
customer_reviews.author: I Like to Buy US Products...

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best dustpan that I've ever had. It allows the finest particles to be swept into the pan on the first try. I can't believe I wasted all those years struggling with my old dustpan and then ended up picking up the debris anyway with a wet paper towel. Can you imagine getting excited over a dustpan? Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy dustpan
customer_reviews.text: This is a good and sturdy dustpan. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Yorba Linda

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for heavy duty use
customer_reviews.text: After buying our first one for mucking out our chicken coop, I came back and bought another for our home renovation projects! This dustpan is heavy-duty and doesn't have that annoying rubber edge that gets in the way when trying to scoop up bulky messes.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a hardy metal dustpan that means business. It will probably last forever.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Sweeping is now a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: Sweeping is SO much easier with a decent dustpan. I previously had a lightweight, plastic dustpan that was pretty awful. This metal one can be left on the floor so you can sweep into it without it moving AND the edge is such that you only need to sweep in once or twice to get all the debris into it. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Linn Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Favorite dust pan
customer_reviews.text: You know you're an adult when you have a fav dust pan!! Well, this is it. You cant break it AND it stays in place when you're sweeping. Who wants lightweight..? You'd never travel with it anyway
customer_reviews.author: Mackey

customer_reviews.title: USA - Solid Sturdy Construction
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully I will never need another dust pan. Replaced several plastic ones from the dollar store in the past only to have them quickly crack. This should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: sasquash58

customer_reviews.title: Came a little bit
customer_reviews.text: There was a slight bend in it so it's hard to pick up ashes
customer_reviews.author: slim

customer_reviews.title: Finally a METAL dustpan
customer_reviews.text: I am no fan of plastic (partly because I am chemically sensitive) and I've been unable to find a metal dustpan to replace my old one that got crunched during my move across the country last year. This basic model works great and the price was good, too. I only wish that the long-handled metal ones weren't so expensive or I'd have gotten one of them. Very quick delivery and arrived in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Classic Dust Pan
customer_reviews.text: The classic metal dust pan. Which is Made in the USA, and should last for pretty much a century or so. Stamped ribs reinforce the steel for a very sturdy pan, and 'Made in the USA' is stamped in the metal.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Classic looks, classic quality. It's the little things ya know.
customer_reviews.author: Theron

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, feels quite heavy for it's size compared to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, feels quite heavy for it's size compared to most dust pans. If you step on it accidentally you may hurt your foot but I doubt you will put a dent in it. It's all once piece so no plastic or rubber lip to come off or wear out. Slight ridge about a half inch from the edge helps keep the dust where it belongs.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica T.

customer_reviews.title: built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: built like a tank... or an AK47. This dust pan will last you a lifetime or more so long as you don't soak it in water.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA!
customer_reviews.text: You cannot find these durable, metal dust pans in the stores; at least, I couldn't. The seller's should advertise that they are manufactured in the USA, I bet they'd sell even more. I'll never go back to the plastic dust pans because they do not pick up as well. The price is very reasonable and it was delivered the next day without expedited shipping cost. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: NEWONENOW

customer_reviews.title: I love it, love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it, love it, love it! After buying many plastic dustpans, it is a pleasure to finally have one that works!!! It may be a tad heavy, but it does the job on the first stroke of the broom!! No more chasing around the streak of debris all over the room!!
customer_reviews.author: ShariD

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy straight edge dust pan. I use it both indoors and outdoors. There are other so called Made in USA metal dustpans sold by Amazon for 4x the price but those units are junk in comparison. The black paint handles outside abuse very well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Furay

customer_reviews.title: Great for garage/shop
customer_reviews.text: Great for garage/shop. Extremely durable. One downside is that with the lack of a rubber rim on the edge it can be difficult to get small particulate in the pan.
customer_reviews.author: jcm

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and sturdy. It is perfect for picking up heavier trash and works so much better than the plastic models I had before. Plus, I figure if it gets gunky I can just run it through the dishwasher with some bleach which is not something I would do with the plastic ones. But, I haven't done this yet so I can't say whether the paint will chip.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gavin

customer_reviews.title: You can really clean up with this tool.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I had a pile of stuff I needed to pick up and wow. I was amazed at how easily it was to pick up with this device.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Perrow

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a dustpan but it sure is better than the junk plastic ones
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: This Is a REAL Dustpan
customer_reviews.text: This is the way I remember dustpans were made in the 60's. The edge is flush with the floor and it's heavy enough to lie it down & sweep directly into it without it skidding across the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Big Tone

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a well constructed item. It's not as big as I expected, but it's size is clearly listed. I'd think about whether the 12" size is what you want. If it is, you're not likely to find a better constructed dustpan.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to clean after messy jobs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an indestructible dustpan and this delivers! It is easy to clean after messy jobs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waxing eloquent about a dustpan
customer_reviews.text: Seriously. I never thought I would be bragging about my dustpan, but this thing saves me a TON of work. I sweep up after my five mess makers at LEAST once a day. No more chasing all the little crumbs into the pan, again and again and again. Two, maybe three passes and the mischief is managed!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rose

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift and the person loved the Dustpan it was just as she remembered as ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the person loved the Dustpan it was just as she remembered as a young girl.
customer_reviews.author: Hallie

customer_reviews.title: Dust pan arrived with a nice paint job and very straight edge
customer_reviews.text: Dust pan arrived with a nice paint job and very straight edge. Works well for my use in the garage and is much preferred over plastic pans which get crinkled edges over time. American made.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Dustpan...woooo
customer_reviews.text: Metal dustpan for the garage, works perfectly. The lip to floor contact is uniform and the dirt is easily swept into the pan. Has a nice hole to hang on a nail in the wall as well.
customer_reviews.author: zootermop

customer_reviews.title: Nice mid size dust pan
customer_reviews.text: Nice dust pan. This pan is heavy duty and will set flat on floor to sweep in without holding.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hinch

customer_reviews.title: Works just like it should
customer_reviews.text: Solid well made product. Works just like it should. Should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what a dust pan should
customer_reviews.text: I love this dust pan. I love that it has scalloped edges to clean the broom bristles and the rubber edge ensures and good smooth pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, once piece construction. Even made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Great American Product!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty Dust Pan as described by so many other reviewers. I hesitated to buy two pans, waiting to check out the quality. the price is very fair, no freight, received it overnight and the quality is unsurpassed. Now I have to buy another one, my wife liked it too much.
customer_reviews.author: R. Balboa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dustpan I've ever owned. It is very strong and I expect it to last a lifetime. Yes it may be a little heavy but it doesn't bend when I attempt to pick up dirt and dust on the floor. I am so over those cheaply made plastic dustpans made in China. This is much better. Threw that half broke Chinese thing out the day this arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline C.

customer_reviews.title: Doing well in the woodshop
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy, will probably last the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Ferich

customer_reviews.title: Would like to see 14 & 16" models as well
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expect,durable,functional,fairly priced. Bought 2. Would like to see 14 & 16" models as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wexler

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a sizable dent in the flat edge, rendering it useless. Do they not inspect these before shipping them out?
customer_reviews.author: UltimateUber

customer_reviews.title: who knew you could love a dustpan
customer_reviews.text: Nothing much to say here that others have not. Very heavy duty metal. Does a great job. I bought it after my plastic one shattered. My husband used it and was so excited we ordered a second one for the garage ;)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to buy
customer_reviews.text: Well made and will last a lifetime. Will never buy the cheap plastic or lightweight metal ones ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S

customer_reviews.title: Nice metal dust pan
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy dust pan. Metal that I can use in the garage where it will get some abuse. I like the weight of it and the lack of static retention that comes from using a plastic dust pan.
customer_reviews.author: J amz online

customer_reviews.title: I'm quite pleased.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice rigid metal dustpan with a decent powder coat finish. It's not huge--I know it says 12' but I think they meant inches. :)
customer_reviews.author: tekHedd

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best dust pan I have owned. Las down flush to the floor not allowing small debris underneath and very solid in structure.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: last to the Past!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think they still made these but I found you sold them and it is for work. The bonus was there was no charge for shipping, while use this vendor again it I need a similar product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Great and USA made
customer_reviews.text: Great dustpan... There isn't much to a dustpan, but this is light, strong, a good size, and it works. Made in the USA too.
customer_reviews.author: JMH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Metal dust pan's are so much better than plastic. This one seems to be made well.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua W

customer_reviews.title: Awsome I use it for getting kindling for our fire ...
customer_reviews.text: Awsome I use it for getting kindling for our fire pit My hand and nails thank me :))
customer_reviews.author: Juliet Soopikian

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functional
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a vacation home where the plastic ones we've been using keep getting stepped on and broken. It's very sturdy and did a good job picking up the dust from sweeping.
customer_reviews.author: David Hilbert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nothing better than a metal dustpan . I t will not crack like some plastic ones do.
customer_reviews.author: Toni the tiget

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those dustpans that the janitor used in the late 60's and 70's. Solid built, works well, better suited for a garage dustpan but works in the house on wooden floor fine.
customer_reviews.author: R. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've finally found a decent dust pan...the old fashioned kind. Quality made, and a great value with shipping free...what a deal!!! I highly recommend this dust pan!!! Thank you UniSan!
customer_reviews.author: SkyBlue10

customer_reviews.title: Overall a really good pan.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a really good pan. However, you still have to make several passes to get most of the fine dust off the floor. Made in USA!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Finally a metal unit
customer_reviews.text: Solid, lays close to the floor and it even gets the little dust.
customer_reviews.author: Calspete

customer_reviews.title: Clean Sweep for Amazon
customer_reviews.text: We looked all over for a metal dustpan. Not the easiest thing to find these days. This one is just what we were looking for - and as usual Amazon had the price we were glad to pay.
customer_reviews.author: M. Zinn

customer_reviews.title: lifetime of use
customer_reviews.text: MUCH better than the plastic. Solid, good lip to pick up dust, and expect it to last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: Deb in Denver

customer_reviews.title: You cant get any better than a solid metal dustpan that wont warp over ...
customer_reviews.text: You cant get any better than a solid metal dustpan that wont warp over time. The only improvement I can think for it is if the handle was designed so that it could lock onto the broom.
customer_reviews.author: PRIME TIME

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be better.
customer_reviews.text: This pan is made in the USA, well designed with reinforcing ribs in the right places and isn't heavy. Couldn't be better.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Collins

customer_reviews.title: perfect, just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Yes! Something not plastic, perfect, just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: AnotherAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Just received. Scratched. I am returning it tomorrow ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received. Scratched. I am returning it tomorrow. I may try it again. Perhaps it was a fluke. Or I may get another product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: No plastic for sweeping and picking up heavy items. This is well built and I several of them one for the front yard and the other the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Dust Pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this dust pan. I was originally worried that the metal might scuff wood floors, but it doesn't do that at all. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm lovin(g) it! What, wrong motto? I can finally get up the pile of dust!
customer_reviews.author: Likes Online

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dustpan and expect to use it for the rest of my life as it is heavy duty and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: T.L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: quality stuff
customer_reviews.text: same sentiments as all the other reviewers. the metal is really heavy and can't foresee the beveled portion getting bent anytime soon, like some other metal dustpans. will last me a lifetime and am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Leith

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Metal
customer_reviews.text: This thing will last forever. So heavy it will stay put by itself as you sweep crud into it. I like it's old fashioned feel.
customer_reviews.author: L.L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality dustpan. It's pretty sturdy, not thin and flimsy. I like it. I use it to get ashes out of our wood stove.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: sjc
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty and should last a long time---Nice long handle so I don't have to stoop as far---free S&H which is great and it arrived the 3rd day after my order was placed.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Carter

customer_reviews.title: Mine is perfectly straight and works great on my wood floors
customer_reviews.text: Solid metal, and will last forever. Mine is perfectly straight and works great on my wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: This one is excellent and relatively inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a decent dustpan that wasn't too expensive. This one is excellent and relatively inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Receives the dirt better than plastic as the lip of the dustpan is ...
customer_reviews.text: Receives the dirt better than plastic as the lip of the dustpan is thinner than the plastic or rubber based ones. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Old school, heavy metal dustpan. You could kill a man with this (and then sweep up the scene)
customer_reviews.author: Blue Hiller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: use it all the time the only way to sweep not one of those cheap plastic pans
customer_reviews.author: wildgw

customer_reviews.title: Great work Dustpan
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for this particular size of Metal dustpan as I do Tile work as I needed the dustpan for small areas especially in bathrooms. Thanks........buy it
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C. Heindl

customer_reviews.title: So good.
customer_reviews.text: I wish every store would carry this one. So good.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Just what I hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to shovel out the ashes from my fire place. After burning holes on my plastic ones I thought I needed a change. This was perfect! Heavy and very we'll made. Will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product!!!
customer_reviews.text: MADE in the USA!! Love it. Just like the original dustpan I have from my family's farm. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Like the good old days!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and made in the USA. It's like the one my grandma had. I got tired of breaking the cheap plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Dobidobi

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: What can you really say? It's a dust pan, it's metal and not plastic, it's made in the USA, and it will probably outlive me.
customer_reviews.author: MuNaught

customer_reviews.title: Inside or outside it works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan, i have one for inside the house and one for the garden. It is great for picking up leaves and I also use it for shoveling the snow off the back steps. It is so much easier than using a long handled shovel and the large straight edge and oversize dust pan make the job quick and easy. The dust pan is sturdy and the hole in the handle is perfect for hanging. There are larger pans and I have one but I prefer this size for most jobs. This dustpan should last a lifetime, I'm very happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: made in usa, works great
